summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 5 mbar), light levels (up 5441 lux), and cloud levels (up 592 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1521 m), light levels (up 7711 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 591.7m lower than yesterday, 1070.9m lower than past week, 1520.7m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 860m to a maximum of 3110m, averaging 1281.7m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2350m and 2800m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels. Drizzle or light rain possible, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
